result.execSummary:
The defendant Keith Kevin Baum was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manuf/Deliver Amphetamine(<=3g) [Modifiers: Penalties for Felonies-Class "F" Felony], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(e)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant to report to Probation today October 26, 2015 by 4:00 p.m.
Bond continues until Defendant reports to Probation.
Probation may be transferred to Minnesota.
Court notes 7 days credit against ultimate sentence.
 
In the event that the defendant is revoked or discharged from either probation or extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victim(s) and/or governmental entities for any balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

Apply bond on file.
DNA surcharge.

AODA and follow any recommended treatment.

CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Evenson ADA: Edward Minser  DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea DF: Keith Kevin Baum appeared. Case called at 10:04. Includes 15CF85, 15CF277, 15CF330. Atty. Andrea updates the court as to agreement.  Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads G to 15CF85 removing the enhancer. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of amended 15CF85. On motion of the State, Crt outright dismisses 15CF277, 15CF330 . Sentencing arguments. DE makes statement. Crt orders: Sentence W/H.
2 years probation with conditions:

30 days condition time STAYED.
Court notes 7 days credit. 
- Costs
   Apply bond on file remaining balance to be paid to payor. 
- AODA and any recommended follow through. 
- 20 hours communtiy service. 
- Submit DNA sample and pay surcharge.
- All programming deemed appropriate by the Compass assessment and DOC. 


DE to sign up for probation by 4:00pm today. Bond will continue until DE signs up for probation. Probation may be transferred to MN.

and   _X_ SIGNATURE BOND:   _X_ Defendant guarantees compliance with the terms of this bond by pledging $4000.00 and understands that if the defendant does not comply with the terms of this bond, the bond will be forfeited and the defendant and/or surety may be ordered to pay the amount of the bond.
 

-Zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.
